'''1.7.10 Build 9<ref name="blog">{{citation|url=https://mcedudev.tumblr.com/post/99896871164/java-8-problem-fixed|title=Java 8 Problem Fixed |date=October 13, 2014 |website=Tumblr|author=}}</ref>'''<ref>{{citation|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20220826194909/https://twitter.com/Tonsse/status/524819823348711424|title=Build 9 Broke|website=Twitter|date=October 22, 2014}}</ref> is the ninth build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.7.10, released on October 13, 2014. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.7.10]].

== Additions ==
=== General ===
* Ability to translate to local languages.
* Ability to translate worlds into different languages.

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* Java 1.8 not working at all with MinecraftEdu (this fix is also applied to [[MinecraftEdu 1.6.4 Build 20|1.6.4 build 20]] and all newer builds)<ref>MinecraftEdu logs: ''<@Tonsse> Apparently MinecraftEdu build 9 broke the World Library in Server Launcher. This is because of the language reformat. Fixing...'' (October 22, 2014)</ref>
* Some test translations not working.
